reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is incredibly passionate about organic chemistry and makes complex concepts easy to understand. Her office hours are super helpful and she genuinely cares about student success.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Lectures are extremely disorganized and the grading seems arbitrary. Often goes off on tangents and doesn't cover the material in the syllabus.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Great lecturer who incorporates real-world examples. Only downside is that the workload can be heavy at times.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Decent professor but moves through material very quickly. You'll need to do a lot of self-study to keep up with the pace.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Best professor I've had! Her analysis of texts is incredible and she encourages great class discussions. Very fair grader too.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Seems knowledgeable but terrible at explaining concepts. Rarely responds to emails and is often dismissive of questions in class.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Really engaging lectures and interesting assignments. Sometimes unclear about expectations for papers but otherwise excellent.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Fantastic instructor who brings real industry experience to the classroom. Projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Lectures are okay but rely too heavily on slides. Lab sessions are well-organized though and she's helpful during them.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Very boring lectures and tends to read straight from the textbook. Tests are much harder than the homework assignments.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Amazing professor who organizes great field trips and brings in guest speakers. Makes the subject matter really relevant to current issues.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and provides lots of practice problems. Sometimes gets frustrated when students ask basic questions.

reviews.subject: Spanish Literature
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable and passionate. Creates a welcoming environment for all language levels and gives great feedback.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting perspectives but can be a bit condescending. Participation is a huge part of the grade which can be intimidating.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable about the subject and shows fascinating examples. Tests are tough but she provides good study guides.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Clearly biased in his teaching and doesn't encourage different viewpoints in discussions. Assignments are poorly explained.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional at breaking down complex concepts. Always available for extra help and provides great practical exercises.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Good real-world examples but lectures can be dry. Group projects are well-structured and helpful for learning.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures with lots of field experience to share. Heavy reading load but material is interesting.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Extremely difficult to understand and unhelpful during office hours. Tests cover material never discussed in class.
